snippet: A young Indian finds fashion inspiration in a national hero in New Delhi’s artsy Hauz Khas Village neighborhood.
abstract: Rahul Jumar, young Indian in New Delhi’s artsy Hauz Khas Village neighborhood, finds fashion inspiration in style of former prime minister Jawaharlal Nehru.

byline.original: By POH SI TENG and JOANNA NIKAS

lead_paragraph: A young Indian finds fashion inspiration in a national hero in New Delhi’s artsy Hauz Khas Village neighborhood.

headline.seo: Fashion From New Delhi’s Hauz Khas Village Neighborhood
